code: import'./rating.css';import fill from'../../assets/business/star-filled.png';import half from'../../assets/business/star-half-fill.png';import empty from'../../assets/business/star-empty.png';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Rating(_ref){var rating=_ref.rating;var numFill=Math.floor(rating);if(rating-numFill>0){var halfFill=true;}var emptyFill=5-Math.ceil(rating);var starArray=[];for(var i=0;i<numFill;i++){starArray.push(/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:fill,style:{width:'20%'}},i));};if(halfFill){starArray.push(/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:half,style:{width:'20%'}},'halfstar'));};for(var i=0;i<emptyFill;i++){starArray.push(/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:empty,style:{width:'20%'}},i+10));}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{width:'60%',margin:'20px'},children:starArray});}export default Rating;
